医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
非洲国家联合承诺向世卫组织投资回合提供超过4500万美元14个非洲国家和许多合作伙伴前所未有地团结一致支持世界卫生组织，承诺向世界卫生组织投资回合提供超过4500万美元的资金，这是一项为期三个月的举措，旨在为该组织提供可持续的融资全球卫生架构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/African-nations-unite-to-pledge-over-2445-million-to-WHO-Investment-Round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/African-nations-unite-to-pledge-over-2445-million-to-WHO-Investment-Round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=191453ad-71d0-4e20-9c76-ff8edd5472c8 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:35:30 -0400 African nations unite to pledge over $45 million to WHO Investment Round
简单的干预措施为密苏里州精疲力尽的护士提供了缓解甚至在冠状病毒大流行之前，高职业倦怠率和人员短缺就困扰着护理行业，这主要是因为工作压力大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Simple-intervention-offers-relief-for-burned-out-nurses-in-Missouri.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Simple-intervention-offers-relief-for-burned-out-nurses-in-Missouri.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88e6e9bd-d7d9-4fb4-9b49-d1556c126d59 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:32:12 -0400 Simple intervention offers relief for burned-out nurses in Missouri
由于知识差距和疫苗不平等，医护人员对麻疹爆发毫无准备研究突显了 2022 年至 2023 年爆发期间，医护人员对 MPOX 的了解存在显着差距，强调需要更好的全球准备和公平的疫苗获取。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Healthcare-workers-unprepared-for-mpox-outbreak-due-to-knowledge-gaps-and-vaccine-inequity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Healthcare-workers-unprepared-for-mpox-outbreak-due-to-knowledge-gaps-and-vaccine-inequity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b69294b-96cf-4062-b7dd-142ed59c4974 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:29:00 -0400 Healthcare workers unprepared for mpox outbreak due to knowledge gaps and vaccine inequity
首次全面描述 SCI 运动员神经性疼痛经历随着 2024 年巴黎残奥会的临近，运动员为参加比赛而进行的大量训练和做出的牺牲成为人们关注的焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/First-compressive-description-of-neuropathic-pain-experiences-among-SCI-athletes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/First-compressive-description-of-neuropathic-pain-experiences-among-SCI-athletes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abc8dfe4-8b46-417b-ad8c-bb33c7342361 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 22:27:19 -0400 First comprehensive description of neuropathic pain experiences among SCI athletes
人工智能区分癌细胞并检测早期病毒感染基因组调控中心 (CRG)、巴斯克大学 (UPV/EHU)、Donostia 国际物理中心 (DIPC) 和 Biofisica Bizkaia 基金会 (FBB，位于 Biofisika 研究所) 的研究人员开发了一种人工智能，可以将癌细胞与正常细胞区分开来，并检测细胞内病毒感染的早期阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Artificial-intelligence- Differentiates-cancer-cells-and-detects-early-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Artificial-intelligence- Differentiates-cancer-cells-and-detects-early-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd09e4d1-ba03-4992-a42f-cbbfd8d90825 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 21:42:08 -0400 Artificial intelligence differentiates cancer cells and detects early viral infections
ChatGPT 提供最准确的输精管结扎信息，优于 Copilot 和 Gemini研究表明，ChatGPT 在准确回答输精管切除术相关问题方面优于 Google Bard 和 Bing Chat，凸显了其在医疗保健教育方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/ChatGPT-delivers-the-most-accurate-vascision-information-outperforming-Copilot-and-Gemini.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/ChatGPT-delivers-the-most-accurate-vascision-information-outperforming-Copilot-and-Gemini.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=475ba07e-b1d7-4737-ac0c-28226cdfd5e4 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 21:34:00 -0400 ChatGPT delivers the most accurate vasectomy information, outperforming Copilot and Gemini
SARS-CoV-2 在大脑中的进化方式不同，揭示了对病毒趋向性的重要见解研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 在小鼠中枢神经系统 (CNS) 内与肺部相比的进化，揭示了 CNS 中更高的病毒分化，并强调了弗林蛋白酶切割位点 (FCS) 在病毒向性和区室化中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/SARS-CoV-2-evolves- Differently-in-the-brain-revealing-ritic-insights-into-viral-tropism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/SARS-CoV-2-evolves- Differently-in-the-brain-revealing-ritic-insights-into-viral-tropism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef546429-c90b-41cb-a040-0db6a4cb33ab Tue, 27 Aug 2024 20:59:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 evolves differently in the brain, revealing critical insights into viral tropism
研究表明地中海饮食提高试管受精成功率审查强调，坚持地中海饮食可能会改善接受辅助生殖的夫妇的临床妊娠和活产率，尽管研究结果不一致，并且需要更多的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Improved-IVF-success-with-the-Mediterranean-diet-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Improved-IVF-success-with-the-Mediterranean-diet-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=520722ed-c601-4d52-b50f-3acc0b8b40aa Tue, 27 Aug 2024 20:45:00 -0400 Improved IVF success with the Mediterranean diet, study shows
高剂量裸盖菇素有望治疗抑郁症研究人员比较了口服单一疗法与迷幻药治疗抑郁症状的有效性和可接受性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/High-dose-psilocybin-shows-promise-for-depression-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/High-dose-psilocybin-shows-promise-for-depression-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=008a4d48-3456-4b23-bad5-fe4dd0cda487 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 17:54:00 -0400 High-dose psilocybin shows promise for depression treatment
科学家发现肠道胰岛素拮抗剂如何通过调节大脑信号来控制线虫的脂肪减少研究人员在秀丽隐杆线虫中发现了一种内源性胰岛素拮抗剂 INS-7，它通过抑制涉及神经肽 FLP-7 的肠道到大脑信号通路来调节脂肪减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Scientists-discover-how-a-gut-insulin-antagonist-controls-fat-loss-in-C-elegans-by-modulate-brain-signals。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240827/Scientists-discover-how-a-gut-insulin-antagonist-controls-fat-loss-in-C-elegans-by-modulate-brain-signals。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56ec13b8-482a-41d8-9689-fe4137543b26 Tue, 27 Aug 2024 17:25:00 -0400 Scientists discover how a gut insulin antagonist controls fat loss in C. elegans by modulating brain signals
